description: A Pink Cadillac is a delightful Mexican drink that has been specially made to be enjoyed at your next house party. The salt rim adds an extra layer of flavor, and you'll love the burst in taste!As this&nbsp;margarita isn't for those who can't handle their liquor - just make sure top shelf alcohol goes into every glass so all guests get something good from it too.
name: Pink Cadillac
recipeIngredient: Lime wedge and Hibiscus Salt for garnish

recipeInstructions.name: Rim a couple glass with a lime wedge. Dip it into the salt mixture.
recipeInstructions.text: Rim a couple glass with a lime wedge. Dip it into the salt mixture.

recipeInstructions.name: Fill the glass with ice and set it aside.
recipeInstructions.text: Fill the glass with ice and set it aside.

recipeInstructions.name: Next, combine the tequila, sweet and sour mix, Grand Marnier, cranberry juice, and the juice of half a lime in a cocktail shaker.
recipeInstructions.text: Next, combine the tequila, sweet and sour mix, Grand Marnier, cranberry juice, and the juice of half a lime in a cocktail shaker.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake, pour, and garnish with another lime wedge.
recipeInstructions.text: Shake, pour, and garnish with another lime wedge.
